text: McDonald's is bringing back the annual favorite Shamrock Shake, as well as Szechuan Sauce, which caused riots when it last hit stores. What to Know McDonald's will ship 20 million packets of Szechuan Sauce, a condiment that came and went 20 years ago It returned for one day in 2017, inspired by the show ` ` Rick and Morty,'' and heavy demand led to riots The chain will also bring back the minty green Shamrock Shake, an annual tie - in to St. Patrick's Day America, if you like oddly colored but strangely tasty semi - liquid products, today is your day.
